rootItem.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for SENDIG variable AC.ACPARMCD

datasetVariables.description: ACPARMCD (the companion to ACPARM) is limited to 8 characters and does not have special character restrictions. These values should be short for ease of use in programming, but it is not expected that ACPARMCD will need to serve as variable names.
datasetVariables.label: Challenge Agent Parameter Short Name
datasetVariables.name: ACPARMCD
